title: Taylor Swift proves to be the ultimate cat lady as she snuggles with Jonathan Van Ness' pets
text:
They're both known for doting on their pets.

And Taylor Swift showed off her supreme cat lady title as she stopped by for a visit with Jonathan Van Ness in New York City on Wednesday.

The 29-year-old musician enjoyed a rare night off as she cuddled up to Jonathan's baby Genivieve on the couch in his Manhattan apartment.

Friends! Taylor Swift showed off her supreme cat lady title as she stopped by for a visit with Jonathan Van Ness in New York City on Wednesday

Taylor sported a gorgeous brown houndstooth blazer paired with a black newsboy cap as she posed for a selfie with the Queer Eye star.

Her makeup was flawless with a signature black cat-eye and sparkling glitter highlighting her cheekbones.

The Over The Top author stayed cozy in a bright purple sweatshirt and showed off a scruffy beard with his long hair tied back in a ponytail.

Hello! Her makeup was flawless with a signature black cat-eye and sparkling glitter highlighting her cheekbones

She added her own witty words: 'Genivieve of the House Van Ness, First of Her Name, the Unscratched, Queen of Meows and nose boops, Catleesi of the East River, Breaker of Wine Glasses, and Mother of hairballs'

'Aunt Taylor came to meet Genivieve & the other babies last night,' he captioned the series of photos.

She added her own witty words: 'Genivieve of the House Van Ness, First of Her Name, the Unscratched, Queen of Meows and nose boops, Catleesi of the East River, Breaker of Wine Glasses, and Mother of hairballs.'

Jonathan adopted a group of new kittens after his beloved Bug fell out of a window while he was sleeping.

He's also the proud owner of Matilda, Harry Larry and Liza.

'Aunt Taylor came to meet Genivieve & the other babies last night,' he captioned the series of photos

Dressed to thrill in glittering threads and vibrant colors, Jonathan was joined by his reality crew incuding Antoni Porowski, Karamo Brown, Bobby Berk and Tan France for Taylor's You Need To Calm Down video

The unlikely duo likely became fast friends when he was invited to star in her video for You Need To Calm Down.

Dressed to thrill in glittering threads and vibrant colors, Jonathan was joined by his reality crew incuding Antoni Porowski, Karamo Brown, Bobby Berk and Tan France.

Taylor's love for cats has been noted for years and she named her two beauties — Olivia Benson and Meredith Grey — after two of her favorite television characters on Law & Order: SVU and Grey's Anatomy.
description: The 29-year-old musician enjoyed a rare night off as she cuddled up to Jonathan's baby Genivieve on the couch in his Manhattan apartment.
